title: Course on Developing Smartphone-Based Mathematics Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Usage Skills and Secondary-Level Mathematical Knowledge
context.additional_context: A practical math competency enhancement program for managers, focusing on developing self-directed learning strategies using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can explain efficient methods for searching and organizing math learning materials using smartphones
Learners can share math problem-solving processes with peer learners and provide feedback using mobile collaboration tools
Learners systematize math concept organization and calculation processes using smartphone applications and digital note-taking tools

resources: Mobile app licenses for math learning

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
